AFTER:
self.with_bias = bias

        self.weight = nn.Parameter(
            torch.Tensor(out_channels, in_channels, *self.kernel_size))
        if bias:
            self.bias = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor(out_channels))
        else:
            self.bias = nn.Parameter(torch.Tensor([0]))  # fake tensor
        self.reset_parameters()
